channel.title: server on My personal website
channel.description: Recent content in server on My personal website

item.title: Serve only some files by exension
item.description: Often I manage websites that use bower as package manager and I don’t want to grant the access to all the packages installed, so I have to filter the file served by nginx.

item.title: An emulator of Pdp8 written in Javascript
item.description: I wrote a new emulator for Pdp8 in Javascript to make it more portable and here you can see the result.
